Instruction: In a large bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, and brown sugar until smooth and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Allow to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
Once cooled, cut the cake into squares and serve.
